raw_response: {"answer_index": 2, "answer_text": "A baffling decrease in the positive predictive value, raising questions about the very fabric of reality and existence", "confidence": 9, "reasoning": "Vaccination against HPV 16 and 18 would dramatically reduce the prevalence of disease, leading to fewer true positives among those who test positive.
